About this site

My name is Mihály B. Koltai and this is a website on both my professional work in systems biology and some of my other interests.

Interests

Since 2010 I have worked in the field of systems biology, ie. the mathematical modeling and quantitative analysis of biomolecular systems.

I did my PhD in computational/mathematical biology in Heidelberg (Germany), and I am currently a postdoctoral fellow in the Computational Systems Biology of Cancer group at Institut Curie in Paris.

You can read about my published work in systems biology here and posts on related topics here.

From time to time I also write on economic and political topics here, where I try to combine qualitative social theory with quantitative analysis.
